alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Pickaway; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 2:49PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHERN PICKAWAY AND NORTHERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Greenfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Washington Court House, Circleville, South Bloomfield, Kingston, Williamsport, New Holland, Logan Elm Village, Good Hope, Frankfort, Fox, Stoutsville, Laurelville, Clarksburg, Adelphi, Tarlton, Austin, Plano, Aw Marion State Park and Andersonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
